description: Associates a set of DHCP options with a VPC, or associates no DHCP options with the VPC.

DhcpOptionsId.description: The ID of the DHCP options set, or default to associate no DHCP options with the VPC.
DhcpOptionsId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the DHCP options set, or default to associate no DHCP options with the VPC.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

VpcId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the VPC.

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement
